dataIdInfo.idPurp: To spatially define the distribution of RSL management units on refuge lands.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: The Refuge System Lands Management Units Feature Class defines general management units on RSL. The boundary of these units may or may not differ from related management unit boundaries (grazing, fire, wetland etc.). If only a single set of management units exist for NWR or WMD, they should be defined here.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Sam D. Hamilton Noxubee National Wildlife Refuge

citRespParty.rpOrgName: US Fish and Wildlife Service, National Wildlife Refuge System

Consts.useLimit: The information depicted in this GIS layer is the result of digital analyses performed on a database consisting of information from a variety of governmental and other credible sources. The accuracy of the information presented is limited to the collective accuracy of the database on the date of the analysis. The information is believed accurate and reasonable efforts have been made to ensure the accuracy of the data. However, the USFWS expressly disclaims responsibility for damages or liability that may arise from use of this data.
